Description.Details: The Light Machine Gun is a lower damage version of the standard Machine Gun, the gain though is increased range while using the same ammunition. Light Machine Guns, like their predecessors have a greatly increased chance to cause Criticals when they impact a target that has been stripped of its armor. Required Hardpoint: Support

Modes.Name: Full Salvo
Modes.Description: Fires the MG at standard speed.

Modes.Name: Double Salvo
Modes.Description: Fires the MG at double speed, decreasing accuracy, increasing heat, but doubles the shots per turn.
